p: The number of potential fungal pathogen OTUs decreased by 35.2% ( F 1, 29 = 7.33, P = 0.0114, f 2 = 0.262, Fig. 1a) and the number of bacterial OTUs increased by 14.6% ( F 1, 29 = 6.55, P = 0.0162, f 2 = 0.234) along the latitudinal gradient, but the numbers of AMF ( F 1, 29 = 0.02, P = 0.9028) and total fungal ( F 1, 29 = 0.76, P = 0.3912) OTUs did not change with latitude (Supplementary Table S2). Soil type did not affect any of these variables or change the effect that latitude had on them (Supplementary Table S2).
